control.name: simpleButton1
control.description: Creates a new ribbon page, adds it to the Ribbon Control's default category and selects the page.

control.name: simpleButton2
control.description: Creates a new page category and adds it to the Ribbon Control's PageCategory collection.

control.name: simpleButton3
control.description: Deletes the active page category. The Default Page Category cannot be removed.

control.name: simpleButton4
control.description: Creates a new page, adds it to the active page category and select the page.

control.name: simpleButton5
control.description: Deletes the selected page from the active category.

control.name: checkEdit1
control.description: If checked, the Page Categories are aligned to the right.

control.name: checkEdit2
control.description: Unckeck this check box to hide categories. In this instance, the Ribbon Control displays only the Default Page Category.
